output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintlvlToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can mint arbitrary amounts of tokens.
Integer overflow in burnlvlToken function allows the owner to set the balance of a user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can burn arbitrary amounts of tokens.

Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a malicious contract to set the balance of a user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can transfer arbitrary amounts of tokens.
mintlvlToken function allows minting of tokens to any address, allowing attackers to increase the total supply arbitrarily.
burnlvlToken function allows the owner to burn tokens of any user, allowing attackers to arbitrarily increase the total supply.
